segments.text: I notice the boy reaching for the cookie jar, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to get in trouble if the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will fall before he gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to unravel at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little amused by how oblivious the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but I’m not holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR
